question.xref: DES s5, DES s10, HC r110-111
question.text: You should ONLY flash your headlights to other road users

explanation.text: You should only flash your headlights to warn others of your presence. Don’t use them to greet others, show impatience or give priority to other road users. They could misunderstand your signal.

answer.text: to show that you are giving way
to show that you are about to turn
to tell them that you have right of way
to let them know that you are there
